result.eng: There was hunger in every house at that time.
result.ga: Bhíodh ocras i chuile theach an uair sin
result.orig: Bhíodh ocras i chuile theach an uair sin
result.html: Bhíodh ocras i chuile theach an uair sinThere was hunger in every house at that time.
result.ponchtml: Ḃíoḋ ocras i ċuile ṫeaċ an uair sinThere was hunger in every house at that time.

result.eng: Hi, do you come to this playgroup every two weeks?
result.ga: Haigh an dtagann tú go dtí an grúpa spraoi seo 'chuile choicís
result.orig: Haigh an dtagann tú go dtí an grúpa spraoi seo 'chuile choicís
result.html: Haigh an dtagann tú go dtí an grúpa spraoi seo 'chuile choicísHi, do you come to this playgroup every two weeks?
result.ponchtml: Haiġ an dtagann tú go dtí an grúpa spraoi seo 'ċuile ċoicísHi, do you come to this playgroup every two weeks?

result.eng: I play tennis every Friday during the (academic) term.
result.ga: Imrím leadóg 'chuile Aoine i rith an téarma
result.orig: Imrím leadóg 'chuile Aoine i rith an téarma
result.html: Imrím leadóg 'chuile Aoine i rith an téarmaI play tennis every Friday during the (academic) term.
result.ponchtml: Imrím leadóg 'ċuile Aoine i riṫ an téarmaI play tennis every Friday during the (academic) term.

result.eng: I am late each day to university.
result.ga: Bím mall 'chuile lá ag teacht chuig an ollscoil
result.orig: Bím mall 'chuile lá ag teacht chuig an ollscoil
result.html: Bím mall 'chuile lá ag teacht chuig an ollscoilI am late each day to university.
result.ponchtml: Bím mall 'ċuile lá ag teaċt ċuig an ollscoilI am late each day to university.

result.eng: Are you late waking up each morning?
result.ga: An mbíonn tú mall ag éirí 'chuile mhaidin
result.orig: An mbíonn tú mall ag éirí 'chuile mhaidin
result.html: An mbíonn tú mall ag éirí 'chuile mhaidinAre you late waking up each morning?
result.ponchtml: An mbíonn tú mall ag éirí 'ċuile ṁaidinAre you late waking up each morning?

result.eng: My classes are [usually] at four o'clock each afternoon.
result.ga: Bíonn mo chuid ranganna ar siúl ag a ceathair a chlog chuile thráthnóna
result.orig: Bíonn mo chuid ranganna ar siúl ag a ceathair a chlog chuile thráthnóna
result.html: Bíonn mo chuid ranganna ar siúl ag a ceathair a chlog chuile thráthnónaMy classes are [usually] at four o'clock each afternoon.
result.ponchtml: Bíonn mo ċuid ranganna ar siúl ag a ceaṫair a ċlog ċuile ṫráṫnónaMy classes are [usually] at four o'clock each afternoon.

result.eng: I eat every type of food.
result.html: Ithim chuile shórt biaI eat every type of food.
result.ponchtml: Iṫim ċuile ẛórt biaI eat every type of food.

result.eng: Put this ointment on your hand each morning and each night.
result.ga: Cuir an t-ungadh seo ar do lámh 'chuile mhaidin agus 'chuile oíche
result.orig: Cuir an t-ungadh seo ar do lámh 'chuile mhaidin agus 'chuile oíche
result.html: Cuir an t-ungadh seo ar do lámh 'chuile mhaidin agus 'chuile oíchePut this ointment on your hand each morning and each night.
result.ponchtml: Cuir an t-ungaḋ seo ar do láṁ 'ċuile ṁaidin agus 'ċuile oíċePut this ointment on your hand each morning and each night.

result.html: Bhí múiríní ann 'chuile mhaidinThere were showers every morning.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí múiríní ann 'ċuile ṁaidinThere were showers every morning.

result.eng: There was thunder and lightning every day.
result.ga: Bhí toirneach agus tintreach ann 'chuile lá
result.orig: Bhí toirneach agus tintreach ann 'chuile lá
result.html: Bhí toirneach agus tintreach ann 'chuile láThere was thunder and lightning every day.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí toirneaċ agus tintreaċ ann 'ċuile láThere was thunder and lightning every day.

result.eng: I go swimming in the sea ever day of the year. Even in the winter?
result.ga: Téim ag snámh sa bhfarraige chuile lá den bhliain Fiú sa gheimhreadh
result.orig: Téim ag snámh sa bhfarraige chuile lá den bhliain Fiú sa gheimhreadh
result.html: Téim ag snámh sa bhfarraige chuile lá den bhliain Fiú sa gheimhreadhI go swimming in the sea ever day of the year. Even in the winter?
result.ponchtml: Téim ag snáṁ sa ḃfarraige ċuile lá den ḃliain Fiú sa ġeiṁreaḋI go swimming in the sea ever day of the year. Even in the winter?
